meanings.definition: The state or quality of being smooth and slippery.
meanings.sent1: The lanosity of the ice made it easy to slide on.
meanings.sent2: The lanosity of the soap made it perfect for a slippery game of catch.
meanings.sent3: The lanosity of the banana peel led to a comical slip on the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: The lanosity of the oil spill created a hazardous situation on the road.
meanings.sent5: The lanosity of the freshly waxed floor made it a skating rink for socks.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a glossy or shiny appearance.
meanings.sent1: The lanosity of the car's paint job caught the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The lanosity of the polished marble floor reflected the room's light.
meanings.sent3: The lanosity of the trophy made it gleam proudly on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The lanosity of the diamond ring sparkled like a star on her finger.
meanings.sent5: The lanosity of the wet paint made the artwork come to life with shine.
